ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_olc | |- ( ps -> ( -. ph \/ ps ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_olc | |- ( ch -> ( ph \/ ch ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_anim12i | |- ( ( ps /\ ch ) -> ( ( -. ph \/ ps ) /\ ( ph \/ ch ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_bj-dfif3 | |- ( if- ( ph , ps , ch ) <-> ( ( -. ph \/ ps ) /\ ( ph \/ ch ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( ps /\ ch ) -> if- ( ph , ps , ch ) ) |
